property.name: hive.in.test
property.description: internal usage only, true in test mode

property.name: hive.metastore.uris
property.description: Thrift URI for the remote metastore. Used by metastore client to connect to remote metastore.

property.name: hive.exec.scratchdir
property.description: HDFS root scratch dir for Hive jobs which gets created with write all (733) permission. For each connecting user, an HDFS scratch dir: ${hive.exec.scratchdir}/<username> is created, with ${hive.scratch.dir.permission}.

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: the URL of the metastore database

property.name: hive.metastore.warehouse.dir
property.description: location of default database for the warehouse

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.bind.host
property.description: Bind host on which to run the HiveServer2 Thrift service.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.port
property.description: Port number of HiveServer2 Thrift interface when hive.server2.transport.mode is 'binary'.

property.name: hive.zookeeper.quorum
property.description: List of ZooKeeper servers to talk to. This is needed for: 1. Read/write locks - when hive.lock.manager is set to org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.lockmgr.zookeeper.ZooKeeperHiveLockManager, 2. When HiveServer2 supports service discovery via Zookeeper. 3. For delegation token storage if zookeeper store is used, if hive.cluster.delegation.token.store.zookeeper.connectString is not set 4. LLAP daemon registry service
